General.Name: Pergamon Status Dis Ticaret AS
General.Description: Pergamon Status Dis Ticaret A.S. engages in the export of ready-to-wear/ready-made garment products in Turkey. It also provides export intermediation services; and tax and foreign trade consultancy services related to tax, other financial legislations, customs, foreign exchange, export, import, inward processing, factoring, and Exim loans in foreign trade. In addition, the company offers legislation and bulletin services, such as changes and developments in tax and other financial legislation, and foreign trade legislation; and information sharing services, such as information about the seminars, panels, or conferences. Further, it organizes information meetings and panels. The company was formerly known as Pergamos Dis Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Pergamon Status Dis Ticaret A.S. as a result of its merger with Status Dis Ticaret A.S. in 2005. Pergamon Status Dis Ticaret A.S. was founded in 2001 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

1.Name: Mr. Nurten  Eskici
1.Title: Director and Deputy Gen. Mang. of Financial & Admin. Affairs
